name: Relic Ball
blurb: Relic Ball leads you on an adventure around the world as you solve mysterious puzzles and collect ancient artifacts.

rewards.reward: ---------------------GUMSHOE----------------------\r\n\r\nEvery bit helps! For a beautiful 100 cents, you get an exotic desktop wallpaper featuring one of the starting environments from our upcoming game, Relic Ball. If you also happen to feel a warm fuzzy feeling of contentment at having helped fuel a start-up game studio, that's from us too!

-----------------Jr INVESTIGATOR----------------\r\n\r\nFor such a wonderful contribution, you will be listed in the "Special Thanks" category of our credits for Relic Ball and will also recieve a package of assorted Relic Ball desktop wallpapers created by Scott. Tim also volunteers to contribute a spiritual high-five.

------------------INVESTIGATOR-----------------\r\n\r\nYou get the gorgeously unique in-game "Founder's Artifact" added to your Relic Ball account at release to brag about and show off to your friends! Above prizes also included.

--------------------INSPECTOR----------------------\r\n\r\nThere isn't a person on a $25 bill, but if there were it would be your angelic mug smiling down on us. You get a mysterious artifact that provides a permanent increase to the in-game powers. Don't know what those powers are? Find out! Because you're invited to our closed Beta testing!  You'll also get the complete digital soundtrack of Relic Ball as composed by Brett Heatley... Above prizes also included.

------------------Jr DETECTIVE-------------------\r\n\r\nFor a  heartwarmingly splendid contribution you get a Relic Ball T-Shirt and will be listed in a special thank-you video hosted by none other than ootii the monster! Above prizes also included.

-------------------DETECTIVE---------------------\r\n\r\nFueling the ootii creative engine with such a radical sum gets you a special in-game Relic named after you that other players can discover...and a mounted print of game art signed by the ootii team! Above prizes also included.

-------------MASTER DETECTIVE---------------\r\n\r\nTo repay such gargantuan goodness we will provide you with free advertisement space for yourself or your company (within reason) for the first six months after the public release of Relic Ball! You will also be immortalized as an in-game caricature that other players can meet in their travels! Above prizes also included.

-------------TREASURE HUNTER---------------\r\n\r\nBestowing a bounty like this will get you a unique in-game level and environment built precisely for you as you imagine it by working along with ootii artist Scott Pellico! Above prizes also included.

---------------EXALTED ARTISAN----------------\r\n\r\nYou along with all Grand Explorers will get a magnificently special dedication at the beginning of every Relic Ball start-up for all players to witness and revel in! We also guarantee that somewhere in the world a mother has just named their newborn baby after you. Above prizes also included.

--------------GRAND EXPLORER---------------\r\n\r\nFor an inconceivably selfless donation you receive unlimited in-game traveling for the lifetime of your Relic Ball game experience. Travel where you want when you want! You will also receive a private monthly newsletter with up-to-date information on the progress of the ootii team and Relic Ball for the first year of public release.  Above prizes also included.

------------------------TITAN-----------------------\r\n\r\nWords do not describe the type of unrelenting humanitarian that you are... so we made a few up! For such a splendiferous miraculasome contribution you will get open communication with the game's developers and will be able to offer solutions and suggestions.  You will also be invited to meet with the ootii team either through Skype or in person if you find yourself in the Orlando, Florida area.  If you do decide to come and visit, we\u2019ll treat you to two tickets to any one of the area theme parks of your choice. Above prizes also included.
